journal-meta.journal-title: Journal of Research in Music Education

title-group.article-title: Call for Papers: Research Perspectives in Music Education

permissions.copyright-holder: MENC: The National Association for Music Education

body.p: Research Perspectives in Music Education (RPME) is the official refereed research journal of the Florida Music Educators’ Association. Its Editorial Board is seeking manuscripts for publication. The journal publishes music education research using qualitative and/or quantitative methodologies and manuscripts of a philosophical, historical, or theoretical nature. Reviews of literature with critical synthesis are also considered. In all cases, implications for music educators must be included.

Please see the Instructions to Contributors and Submission Procedures available at http://www.flmusiced.org/dnn/Publications/ResearchPerspectivesInMusicEducation/InstructionsforContributors/tabid/114/Default.aspx. Papers may be submitted at any time, but to ensure consideration for publication in the following volume, submissions should be received by the editor as soon as possible.
Three members of the Editorial Board will blind-review submissions that conform to the submission guidelines. Authors will normally be notified of the status of the review within two months.
